example.code:
PS C:\> Get-SSMInventoryEntriesList -InstanceId "i-0cb2b964d3e14fd9f" -TypeName "Custom:RackInfo"
CaptureTime : 2016-08-22T10:01:01Z Entries : {Amazon.Runtime.Internal.Util.AlwaysSendDictionary`2[System.String,System.String]} InstanceId : i-0cb2b964d3e14fd9f NextToken : SchemaVersion : 1.0 TypeName : Custom:RackInfo
example.description: This example lists all the custom inventory entries for an instance.

example.code:
PS C:\> (Get-SSMInventoryEntriesList -InstanceId "i-0cb2b964d3e14fd9f" -TypeName "Custom:RackInfo").Entries
Key Value --- ----- RackLocation Bay B/Row C/Rack D/Shelf E
